title: Looking for people to play with!
body: looking for people to play with, i'm newish to the game so i will make some mistakes, im not looking for someone to teach me, just looking for non salty people to paly with as there are so many people with smurfs/Alt accounts that get so mad at new players for not being able to play at their skill level v.v

replies.body: Add me if you want im unranked, I'm not sure how good I am at the game. But I'm a team player :P
im also unranked haha i only just hit level 30 but sadly i cant add you since youre NA and im OCE :(
sure ill send you an add~
Come hang on discord with us. https://discord.gg/egcQMR
i joined it, now what xD
I only ARAM, and everyone is welcome.
i dont play aram often but if i feel like playing aram ill send you an add and we can get the dice rolling!
Im keen to play norms and stuff for fun
add me if you want. play duo with you ranked or unranked all good
